attributes.action: A three state solution for Palestine and Israel
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Jews and Muslims since 1948 have both suffered allot due to conflicts. A two state solution has failed because often of religious conflict, a three state solution allows Palestinians a choice, it would seem Gaza and West bank could be two seperate states along side Israel. 

We need to think outside the box regarding this conflict.

rejection.details: Your title should be a call for government action, not a statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
